title: Helen Dinner
description: A quick and satisfying dinner featuring cheesy quesadillas, sautéed zucchini, and sunny-side up eggs, topped with salsa and avocado.
instructions: Chop zucchini into medallions. Sauté in butter until tender.
Make a quesadilla with 2 tortillas and half the cheese. Cook until golden brown on both sides.
Assemble: Place quesadilla on a plate, top with refried beans, zucchini, eggs, salsa, and avocado slices.
